bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. Combined Designation of pathogenic evil affecting the body from outside. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry mi wu 蘼蕪： 咳逆，定驚氣，辟邪惡，除蠱毒鬼疰，去三蟲 , “It controls coughing with counterflow [of qi], stabilizes fright qi, eliminates evil and malign [qi] , discards gu poison and demon attachment-illness, and removes the thee types of bugs/ worms”.
